attributes.action: Give parent and child parking spaces the same legal status as a disabled space.
attributes.additional_details: As a first time mother of a young baby it’s opened my eyes to how difficult it can be to get my baby and her accessories out of the car in a standard space. However I find many people park in parent and child bay without a child or a care. I have seen many heated arguments take place in the car park and on social media about this problem and it’s time we changed it. The spaces do not need to be closer to do the door just wider and have action taken against people who park there without children.
attributes.background: Change the law to make parking in a parent and child parking bay without a child under 12 illegal with a fine of up to £100 to give parity with disabled parking spaces.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700850
